divs: Sighting Detailsi was driveing to work in cedar rapids it was cold out dont rember the time it was dark i could see the glow of lights from marion thats how i noticed it comeing toward me it was low so i stoped the truck and left the lights on and waited the object flew directly over the truck it was about 25 to 30 feet over the truckit was big with the head lights on the trucki could see the bottom of it it was a dark color like dark grey or black and it had a stripe around what pat of the bottom i could see the bottom was flat and no out side lightsit hovered over me and i watched it for a few minutes i could see what looked like tiles glued on it i got in the truck started it and started driveing away towards marion this thing didnt give off any engine noice no air from a prop no nothing
trends: There have been no other sightings in Martelle
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i seen it comeing from the west it hovered over the truck then went east
